name: Express Yourself with Custom Colors
description: Choose your own text color to make every lyric and note feel uniquely yours. Stand out with a personal touch across your recordings.

name: Switch Between Light and Dark Mode
description: Enjoy the flexibility of light or dark mode with a single tap. Create in the mode that feels just right, day or night.

name: Smooth Start with a Splash
description: Experience a welcoming splash screen that sets the stage for creativity, complete with a progress indicator for a seamless entry.

name: Guided Onboarding Walkthrough
description: Start off right with a 4-step guided tour that smoothly introduces you to Lyric Drop’s core features, powered by Framer Motion animations.

name: Record Anywhere, Anytime
description: Lyric Drop is designed for every screen size. Whether you’re on a phone or tablet, capture your music wherever inspiration strikes.

name: State Management for an Effortless Experience
description: Enjoy a smooth, intuitive experience with refined state management that keeps all your preferences and settings right at your fingertips.

name: Enhanced Styling for Your Theme
description: Lyric Drop’s updated styling effortlessly adapts to your chosen theme and colors, creating a consistent, sleek interface no matter your preference.

name: Accessibility-First Design
description: Your app, accessible to all. Lyric Drop includes enhanced ARIA labels and interactive elements for an inclusive experience.

name: Customize Your Creative Space
description: Take control of your recording environment with flexible theme, color, and style options. Lyric Drop gives you the tools to create without limits.

name: Seamless Recording with Zero Interruptions
description: Record your music smoothly with an app that’s designed to minimize distractions and keep you in the flow. Lyric Drop is all about uninterrupted creativity.

name: Fast and Flexible Theme Switching
description: With just a tap, switch between light and dark modes without missing a beat. Customize your workspace instantly to match your vibe.

name: Personalize Your Journey
description: From onboarding to recording, Lyric Drop tailors your experience to fit your style, giving you complete control over every detail along the way.
